In a message dated 10/2/2007 11:52:51 A.M. Pacific Daylight Time,
jfetteroll@... writes:

Kat and I have done it (even completed it! :-) three times and are
planning on doing it again.

It *is* a lot of fun. :-)

i'm gonna do it!!! :)

Karen

messages.messageBody:
On Oct 2, 2007, at 2:21 PM, Kidgie@... wrote:

> _NaNoWriMo Young Writers Program_ (http://ywp.nanowrimo.org/) I
> just signed
> up for the National Novel Writing Month event from this site, and
> thought
> I'd mention not only that, but link ya'll to the young writer's
> page from the
> same place. I'm not sure about the details, but it looked
> interesting enough
> to send out :)

Kat and I have done it (even completed it! :-) three times and are
planning on doing it again.

It *is* a lot of fun. :-)

Joyce

messages.subject: Young Writers anyone?
messages.msgSnippet: _NaNoWriMo Young Writers Program_ (http://ywp.nanowrimo.org/)  I  just signed up for the National Novel Writing Month event from this site, and  thought I d
messages.messageBody:
_NaNoWriMo Young Writers Program_ (http://ywp.nanowrimo.org/) I just signed
up for the National Novel Writing Month event from this site, and thought
I'd mention not only that, but link ya'll to the young writer's page from the
same place. I'm not sure about the details, but it looked interesting enough
to send out :)

Karen
